title: Tool Stack Visualizer
subtitle: Explore pre-configured tool combinations designed to work together effectively
gettingStartedDesc: Begin with the Foundation stage tools. Ensure community buy-in and establish basic governance structures before proceeding.
culturalIntegrationDesc: Adapt each tool to your community's cultural context. Consult with cultural leaders and traditional knowledge keepers.
monitoringProgressDesc: Use the built-in evaluation protocols to track implementation success and make adjustments as needed.
iterativeApproachDesc: Implement tools gradually, learn from each deployment, and adapt your approach based on community feedback.
